SELECT R.REVIEW_NO , R.CONTENT , M.NICK , P.PRODUCT_NO , P.NAME AS P_NAME , TO_CHAR (R.ENROLL_DATE, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS ENROLL_DATE , R.IMG , R.RATING , R.DEL_YN FROM REVIEW R JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEMBER_NO = R.MEMBER_NO JOIN ORDERS_LIST L ON L.ORDER_LIST_NO = R.ORDER_LIST_NO JOIN PRODUCT P ON P.PRODUCT_NO = L.PRODUCT_NO
AND R.REVIEW_NO LIKE '%' || #{reviewNo} || '%'
AND M.NICK LIKE '%' || #{nick} || '%'
ORDER BY REVIEW_NO DESC OFFSET #{pageNo} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{limit} ROWS ONLY
